short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your dividends from WealthSimple and visualize your progress to financial independence!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 100% FREE!

💡 Features

1️⃣ Switch between Managed, Self-Directed, and Cash accounts to view estimated yearly dividends and interest payouts

2️⃣ Get a monthly breakdown of your dividend and interest payments

3️⃣ View a detailed history of all your past dividend and interest payouts, with filters for account types, specific accounts, and securities


🚀 Quick Start Tips

- Log in to your WealthSimple account
- Click the extension icon to get started


🔐 Privacy Concerns

We do not collect or store your data.

During the initial setup, log in to WealthSimple to sync your holdings and dividend/interest payout information. All data is stored locally in your browser and will never be transmitted to any external services.

For more details on our privacy policy, please visit https://www.ws-div.ca/privacy
